Weekly News

This page includes current announcements at First Baptist. This is the same information that is found in the weekly bulletin.

Sunday Bible Study

  • Early Sunday School: Sundays, 9:15 AM (Intergenerational Class)
  • Late Sunday School: Sundays, 10:15 AM (Bykota) & 10:45 AM (Two by Two, Friendship, and an Intergenerational Class)

Mid-Week Bible Study

Mid-Week Bible Study is on the 2nd and 4th Wednesday of each month at 1 PM at Riverside Baptist. Wade will be leading this study. Everyone is also invited to attend a Bible study at Riverside on the 1st and 3rd Wednesday at 10 AM led by Jan Largent.

Wednesdays Evenings

Each Wednesday evening, those involved in Wednesday night activities gather at 5:30 PM for a pitch-in meal. Everyone is invited to join. The Handbells will rehearse at 6 PM and the Sanctuary Choir at 7:10 PM. Children’s Choir and Kids Club begins at 6 PM. There will be no childcare provided on Wednesday evenings.

Children’s Church

Children’s Church is during the Late Worship Gathering. Children’s Church is for children in kindergarten through 2nd grade. The children are dismissed before the sermon to the basement classroom for their worship time.

Camp Barnabas Sign Up

The teens are going to be serving at Camp Barnabas July 5-12. If you are interested in going, you need to sign up by January 1. The forms are available at .

CCT Meeting

The CCT will meet Monday, December 9 at 7:00 PM in the church office.

Helping Families in Need

If you would be willing to contribute to families within the church for the Christmas season, please contact Gayle Songer 744-0991 or Barb Eidson 744-0161. Thank you for any help you can offer.

Missional Community Break

Missional Communities at First Baptist Muncie began at the beginning of 2013. The ministry runs from February-May (taking a two-month break in the summer) and from August-November (taking a two-month break in the winter). This month, we begin our winter break. Life group leaders will meet during this time to evaluate and discuss the Spring term plans. Please keep this team in your prayers as they work through December and January to prayerfully consider God’s leading for 2014. If you have not been a part of the Missional Community, let me encourage you to consider being involved in 2014. Missional Communities are for anyone in the church, young and old alike.

United Choir Rehearsal

The United Choir will rehearse on Saturday, December 14 from 9 AM to noon.

Birthday Party for Jesus

The Children's Birthday Party for Jesus is Saturday, December 14 from 10:30 AM-Noon. We will be gathering in the lower auditorium at FBC. Children age birth-5th grade and their families are welcome and encouraged to join us. This is our annual Birthday Party for Jesus, to celebrate His birth and to offer a setting for families with children to form unity and have FUN together. There will be games, prizes, singing and a light lunch for everyone. Please RSVP to Christy by call/text or email her at so we know how much food and how many gifts to get for the children.

Tithes and Offerings

From January through October, our income was 94.3% of expenses. We hope that everyone will prayerfully consider your tithes and offerings as an act of worship.

Financial Reports

Financial Reports and CCT Meeting Summaries are available in the church office on the receptionist's desk.

Visitor and Bulletin Information

If you would like to place an announcement in the church bulletin please email it to . If you have an article for the January newsletter, please email it to by Sunday, December 15.

Open Door Food Distribution

On Wednesday, December 11, Open Door Ministries will be passing out food to needy families from 7:30-9:30 AM. If you know of someone who could use help with food, please let Duane Davis know. If you have a group (SS Class, Mission Circle, or Life Group) that would like to help distribute food, please contact Matt Headley.

Sign Up to Ring Bells

If you and your family or you and a friend have not signed up to ring bells for Salvation Army, please remember that on December 17 and 19 FBC will be ringing. There is a sign-up sheet posted on the bulletin board in the lower hallway.

    About Us

    First Baptist Church Muncie has a rich history, but is also a forward looking, ministry-oriented congregation.
    First Baptist is located at 309 E. Adams Street, Muncie, IN 47396, Phone: 765-284-7749
